content.description: The figure above shows a pole with a spring around it and a 0.10 kg block with a hole in the middle on top of the spring. A light horizontal string is attached to the block and a wall. When the block is oscillating at 5.0 Hz, the standing wave shown is formed.
content.question: The spring constant of the spring is approximately which of the following?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
